heading: HR00955
0:
A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE INTER-AGENCY COUNCIL CREATED UNDER
REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11106 OR THE FILIPINO SIGN LANGUAGE ACT, TO
SUBMIT TO THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES A COMPREHENSIVE
REPORT ON THE MONITORING AND IMPLEMENTATION OF THIS
ACT AND FOR THE HOUSE SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON PERSONS
WITH DISABILITIES TO INVESTIGATE, INQUIRE, AND LOOK INTO,
THE DELAY IN THE ISSUANCE OF ITS IMPLEMENTING RULES AND
REGULATIONS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENSURING THE RIGHTS
OF THE DEAF COMMUNITY IN THE COUNTRY SUCH AS BUT NOT
LIMITED TO ACCESS TO INFORMATION, EDUCATION AND HEALTH
SERVICES UNDER R.A. NO. 11106 DURING COVID-19 CRISIS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-06-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00955
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE INTER-AGENCY COUNCIL CREATED UNDER REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11106 OR THE FILIPINO SIGN LANGUAGE ACT, TO SUBMIT TO THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES A COMPREHENSIVE REPORT ON THE MONITORING AND IMPLEMENTATION OF THIS ACT AND FOR THE HOUSE SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES TO INVESTIGATE, INQUIRE, AND LOOK INTO, THE DELAY IN THE ISSUANCE OF ITS IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENSURING THE RIGHTS OF THE DEAF COMMUNITY IN THE COUNTRY SUCH AS BUT NOT LIMITED TO ACCESS TO INFORMATION, EDUCATION AND HEALTH SERVICES UNDER R.A. NO. 11106 DURING COVID-19 CRISIS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ARROYO, MA. LOURDES T.
DATE FILED : 2020-06-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-06-05
